損.definition: to decrease; to lose; to damage; to harm; (coll.) to ridicule; to deride; (coll.) caustic; sarcastic; nasty; mean; one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes: ䷨

損人.definition: to harm others; to mock people; to taunt; humiliating

損人不利己.definition: to harm others without benefiting oneself (idiom)

損人利己.definition: harming others for one's personal benefit (idiom); personal gain to the detriment of others

損傷.definition: to harm; to damage; to injure; impairment; loss; disability

損公肥私.definition: to damage the public interest for personal profit (idiom); personal profit at public expense; venal and selfish behavior

損失.definition: loss; damage; CL:個|个[ge4]; to lose; to suffer damage

損毀.definition: to damage; to wreck; to destroy

損益.definition: profit and loss; increase and decrease

損益表.definition: income statement (US); profit and loss account (UK)
